jade.path
Class AStar

java.lang.Object
  jade.path.AStar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Path
public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object
implements Path

An implementation of Path that uses the A* pathfinding algorithm to find the shortest path. Subclasses could adjust the heuristic estimates to produce more interesting result.

hEstimate

protected double hEstimate(Coord c1,
                           Coord c2)
This method is the heuristic estimate used to optimize A*. In other words, it is the likley hood that a square will be on the shortest path between two nodes. By default, it just calculates the distance from the c1 to c2, but could be overridden to factor in other cost in node traversal.
